column5: How do you affix your dividers in your plano stowaways?I try to cut them apart with a bit of flashing left on it for a snug fit but sometimes they just break off clean and then they don't fit tight.Not sure if a super glue would work on that material either.Thoughts?
Small dab of silicone or hot melt glue in one or both of the bottom corners.  That way you can still remove them without too much effort or damage.  Michael
